com.mk4droid.IMC_Services

Class DatabaseHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.mk4droid.IMC_Services.DatabaseHandler

  • public class DatabaseHandler
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    Handles all operations for storing locally a subset of the remote MySQL of IMC to local SQLite

      • addUpdIssues

        public int addUpdIssues(double CurrLong,
               double CurrLat,
               int distance,
               int IssuesNo,
               android.content.Context ctx)
        Download and update the local table of Issues.
        Parameters:
        CurrLong - Download center position longitude
        CurrLat - Download center position latitude
        distance - Range around center position to download
        IssuesNo - Max number of issues to download
        Returns:
        downloaded bytes number
